Text.Page: Your first job down here is going to be to kill the melee fighters patrolling the Halls of Utterdark. The {@LinkCreature:20#30120100#devan outriders}, {@LinkCreature:20#30120101#assassins}, and {@LinkCreature:20#30141000#lokian reapers} all carry scrips that {@LinkCreature:220#1029#Kurbain} will find of interest. He's researching the hierarchy of the organization that's taken over here. Give him any help you can.

Oh, fantastic, I needed more of these.

You said Arthgal sent you here? Good man. He knows I've needed help here for some time.
